opinion.opinion_text:
After plenary consideration of this matter (Reese v. State,191 Ga. App. 887 (383 S.E.2d 149) (1989)), it is found not to satisfy the criteria for the grant of certiorari, and the writ is therefore vacated.
All the Justices concur.
DECIDED NOVEMBER 22, 1989.
